name: Match Me If You Can
description:
A crime has been committed.

The killer is hidden in a pub where a speed-dating event is taking place.

Infiltrate the event undercover, casually question the suspects, connect the dots, and arrest the murderer... Unless love turns up to mess with your plans...

This video game was created during the ARTE GAME JAM 2020.

Programming: Florence Noé, Karine Houbrix
Graphics: Mathilde Herard, Tristan Itier
Sound design: Edward Clombe
Writing: Pierre Corbinais
